1.1.0.en: Added support for light and dimmer modules.

1.1.1.en: Updated the app id for publishing.

1.3.0.en: Added comfort sensors and alloff routine.

1.3.4.en: Fixed an application crash that can happen when a device is deleted.

1.4.0.en: Added support for the Niko Fan module.

1.5.0.en: Added all comfort sensor button variants.

1.5.2.en: Fixed a few crashes and added capability to Connected Controller.

1.6.1.en: Improved the images for the All-off routine.
